You can stay listed on our app for as long as you want, there is no subscription and it doesn’t cost your company a cent unless you ‘accept’ a job.\nBut if you have to go, the team at Fixezi has appreciated your loyalty and we are sorry to see you go, please feel free to re-join anytime.
Touch anywhere on screen to take picture
Here at Fixezi we aim to give our users the simplest and most user friendly app we could think of. \nSo if you are experiencing any problems or have any suggestions, we would love to hear from you.
use any of these networks below\n to link to your friends

This app requires the use of your current location,camera and your personal details to be stored in app and will not be displayed unless requested by Fixezi - The App Of All Trades

We are not liable for any damages, theft, fire, flooding, lack of safety that may harm you or others, we also are not responsible for quality of workmanship efficiency or price.

All tradesman must insure his/her contractor license number is displayed in the uploaded services they provide if applicable.Failure to do so will envolve instant dismisal from Fixezi 
To check to see if you need to add a contractor license to your advertisment
These terms and conditions apply to the user/tradesman
These terms and conditions apply to the user/tradesman

All Tradesman are not allowed to add any pricing in regards to the services they provide\nIn regards to 24 emergency call out, when tradesmen receive a job from any user, the tradesmen will have to call that user to inform them how much the charge for the emergency service will be.
This is all the locations you offer your mobile trade services, When a user search for your trades, your company will show in their search results if they live within the radius you selected.

We want to be a fair trade advertising application for both User and Tradesman combined, Providing up-to-date feedback on Tradesman to make it easier for general house owners and business owners to select tradesman.

The benefits are spread between users and tradesman listed because of the rating system we have in place, this makes it fair for all tradesman listed.

Also the user can set a rating and it will allow the the next user to have a much more informed decision of which tradesman to choose.

The Tradesman will have full control of what jobs are accepted, rejected or cancelled, and be able to view job cards from every user who books a job with your company.

Payment categories are split into 4 sections, trade/categories determine the amount of viewing you get from users and work you receive i.e you only work in one trade and you only work residential you will only pay $30 per month.

We want to be a fair trade advertising application for both User and Tradesman combined, Providing up-to-date feedback on Tradesman to make it easier for general house owners and business owners to select tradesman.

The benefits are spread between users and tradesman listed because of the rating system we have in place, this makes it fair for all tradesman listed.

Also the user can set a rating and it will allow the the next user to have a much more informed decision of which tradesman to choose.

The Tradesman will have full control of what jobs are accepted, rejected or cancelled, and be able to view job cards from every user who books a job with your company.
24 Hr Emergency Callouts apply After Hours, In Weekends and on Public Holidays. If you have chosen an emergency callout hour the Tradesman will call you to inform you of the CALLOUT FEE.

Thanks for subscribing with us we will do everything we can to give you more work, but we can\'t do everything, you need to make sure you post a clear and well uploaded image for your company heading and services this is crucial to getting more jobs.\nAlso you will be rated on your performances as a qualified tradesman and this rating is seen by all users using this application, so good luck and we hope that will continue to use us in the years to come.

Thanks for paying per job we will do everything we can to give you more work, but we can\'t do everything, you need to make sure you post a clear and well uploaded image for your company heading and services this is crucial to getting more jobs.\nAlso you will be rated on your performances as a qualified tradesman and this rating is seen by all users using this application, so good luck and we hope that will continue to use us in the years to come.
\n\nThats about it, If you have any problems please comment in "' What do you think of Fixezi'" in your profile menu.
Any information or images uploaded in "'Tradesmen sign up'"can be edited in the tradesman "'Company Profile'"
User will have the ability to rate your company.
You can also rate the user..
Do try and answer all job notifications as quick as you can please.
All payments will be made via the "'Stripe'" credit card payment system and is very secure.
You can control everything from the tradesmen admin screen "'Admin dashboard'
You can put your company account on hold or make it Active whenever you like, this will be visible to the user
Cancelled jobs can\'t be opened.\nDo you want to delete this job?
You dont have a payment plan.To see the user details please accept and choose payment plan

Whilst working as a tradesman and conversing with clients one on one over the many years I came across many conflictions and problems both tradesmen and client faced, issues that seemed to sit in my mind over the years, that in turn developed into an idea of how to help the everyday house/business/property owner/tradesmen work harmoniously while also helping the building and maintenance economy. It started as a simple idea, but through dedication, problem solving, and design we soon realized to turn this idea of ours into an App would take some serious dedication, passion and vision. Two years in the making, little did we know it but creating a working Application out of words, arrows and numbered sequences jotted down on a large whiteboard was a little daunting and we still didn’t have a name. A name that was describing, an adjective or a play on words (was the thought process), a process that had us checking over 1000’s of names for weeks. The list of names had to be checked, double checked and triple checked to make sure they were available. \'Fixezi-The App of All Trades’ was born, a trade based advertising application for smart phones and website that can be used by every house/property owner, business or realtor or even another tradesmen looking for qualified, reliable, quality tradesmen.
We give you 3 Employee Id\'s, If you need more Employee Id\'s they will have to be bought below
By selecting \'Accept\' as the account holder you agree you will pay the tradesmen once they finished the job.
Will you be at this property/on site when tradesmen arrives?

You are able to put a temporary \'hold\' on your company, all user\'s will not be ablr to view/select your company as it will show that you are unavailable, simply select <font color=\'#7CC25E\'>\'YES\' </font>below to put a \'hold\' on your company. You can always remove the \'hold\' by selecting \'active\' at any time.\n\nDo you wish to continue?
Take a photo of your invoice/receipt
The client will receive any invoice/receipt & note once job is completed
